title: Getting Real: Surviving Sarah / The Great Chase / The Last Virgin
description: Surviving Sarah by Vicki Lewis ThompsonFinancial planner Luke Richards has entered a battle-of-the-brawn reality TV show for one reason. He wants the "prize"--Sarah Donovan, former teen star and Luke's high-school fantasy. Only fantasy has nothing to do with Reality TV...The Great Chase by Julie Elizabeth LetoCharlotte "Charlie" Cuesta and Sam Ryan are rival P.I.'s--and former lovers. But when she finds herself partnered with sexy Sam once more--traveling cross-country in a reality show--she can't help wondering if he'll get even before she falls for him again...or after?The Last Virgin by Jennifer LaBrecqueWhen Andrea Scarpini signs up for a bachelorette-style show with a twist--she never realizes her virginity will be up for grabs! Contestant Zach Richards is an undercover journalist, determined to be the first to prove Reality TV isn't real at all. And he ends up being the first, all right...
author: Vicki Lewis Thompson
